video.name: VEGAN GLUTEN FREE PUMPKIN MUFFINS - with Streusel | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Hearty Vegan Gluten free Pumpkin Muffins! Soft, satisfying muffins with oats, almond flour, pumpkin, spices and a pecan streusel. 
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2019/09/vegan-gluten-free-pumpkin-muffins.html

These hearty breakfast muffins are handy to have around for snacking. They are all things fall with pumpkin, spices and satisfying with the oats and almond in them.

These muffins are gluten-free with almond and oat flours and a bit of starch. The streusel has some flour, pecans and cinnamon. Add an icing for extra moisture and serve there warm with some vegan butter. You can also bake the batter in a brownie pan for hearty breakfast bars. Add more streusel and bake until a toothpick from the center comes out clean.

For regular flour muffins, try these pumpkin cream cheese stuffed muffins. https://www.veganricha.com/2015/09/vegan-pumpkin-cream-cheese-muffins.html


#easyveganrecipes #veganricha #pumpkinmuffins #glutenfreepumpkinmuffins

MY BOOKS:
INDIAN KITCHEN (Best-Seller):  https://veganricha.com/vegan-richas-indian-kitchen-cookbook
EVERYDAY KITCHEN: https://veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen
Both have about 150 Recipes each. With many gluten-free, nut-free, soy-free recipes and options listed with recipes. Available everywhere Internationally as well.

Music: Sky by Markvard

recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup pumpkin puree (, not pumpkin pie filling)
1/3 cup coconut sugar (or light brown sugar)
3 tbsp oil ((neutral safflower oil or refined coconut))
1/4 cup oat flour (, substitute option in notes)

recipeInstructions.text: Line a muffin pan with liners. Preheat the oven to 375 deg F (190 C).
recipeInstructions.name: Line a muffin pan with liners. Preheat the oven to 375 deg F (190 C).

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the flax meal with water and set aside for 2 mins. In a large bowl, combine the flax "egg", pumpkin puree, sugar, maple, vinegar, oil and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the flax meal with water and set aside for 2 mins. In a large bowl, combine the flax "egg", pumpkin puree, sugar, maple, vinegar, oil and vanilla extract. Mix until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oats to the puree mixture, and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oats to the puree mixture, and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dry ingredients and mix well to make a thick batter. Add 3-4 tbsp chopped pecans if you like. Spoon the thick mixture into prepared muffin pan. (I use a cookie scoop to scoop the thick mixture into the pan. Then use the scoop or spatula to even the top a bit)
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dry ingredients and mix well to make a thick batter. Add 3-4 tbsp chopped pecans if you like. Spoon the thick mixture into prepared muffin pan. (I use a cookie scoop to scoop the thick mixture into the pan. Then use the scoop or spatula to even the top a bit)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Streusel: Mix flour, sugar, cinnamon in a bowl. Add vegan butter or oil and mix with your hands to make breadcrumbs. Add in the pecans and mix in. Spoon the streusel over the muffins.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Streusel: Mix flour, sugar, cinnamon in a bowl. Add vegan butter or oil and mix with your hands to make breadcrumbs. Add in the pecans and mix in. Spoon the streusel over the muffins.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 20 mins. Check if the muffins are done. Remove from the pan after 5 mins. let cool completely covered with a light kitchen towel. Add a simple sugar icing drizzle if you like.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 20 mins. Check if the muffins are done. Remove from the pan after 5 mins. let cool completely covered with a light kitchen towel. Add a simple sugar icing drizzle if you like.

recipeInstructions.text: Store: on the counter for the day, refrigerate for upto 5 days. Microwave to warm and serve with vegan butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Store: on the counter for the day, refrigerate for upto 5 days. Microwave to warm and serve with vegan butter.
